subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jorge Posada’s two-run home run gave the Yankees the win in the first game, but no Yankee could solve Reds’s ace Johnny Cueto, who surrendered only two hits in the night cap.
snippet: Jorge Posada’s two-run home run gave the Yankees the win in the first game, but no Yankee could solve Reds’s ace Johnny Cueto, who surrendered only two hits in the night cap.
